subject: Create symlinks in %install section
commitMessage:
Create symlinks in %install section

Move symlink creation from %post to %install section so they are owned by package.
Also don't create directories in %post section unnecessarily.

Change-Id: Ib01444013a45e8a40c02ceed58c58478e3eb45e0
Signed-off-by: Jacek Bukarewicz <j.bukarewicz@samsung.com>
